Image Recipes

Core Image Configuration

The layer provides several image configuration files:

image-seabot.bb

Main image recipe that includes base configurations.

Include Files: - image-seabot-base.inc: Base image configuration - network-config.inc: Network configuration - seabot-acceleration.inc: Hardware acceleration - seabot-extrausers.inc: User management - seabot-pkg-conf-base.inc: Package configuration - seabot-power-manager.inc: Power management - seabot-tools.inc: Development tools - usb-ethernet.inc: USB Ethernet support - virtualization.inc: Virtualization support

Example usage:

bitbake image-seabot
